```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Setting the seed in order to have the same results for every trial
set.seed(1331)
library(boot) #for boot and boot.ci
```

```{r}
n <- 20 #sample size
x <- rnorm(n, mean=0) #Generate samples from rnorm
x <- as.matrix(x) 
alpha <- c(0.05, 0.95)

# function to compute the sample mean
theta.boot <- function(dat, i){
  mean(dat[i]) #Computing sample mean
}

boot.obj <- boot(x, statistic=theta.boot, R=2000)

#calculations for bootstrap confidence intervals

#normal
print(boot.obj$t0 + qnorm(alpha)*sd(boot.obj$t))

#basic
print(2*boot.obj$t0 - quantile(boot.obj$t, rev(alpha), type=1))

#percentile
print(quantile(boot.obj$t,alpha, type=6))

```
